My neighbor, we are both strangers here

So if you connect with me, let kinship be present

and if you shun me, alas, A stranger remains so!

My neighbor, what is gone will not return

and what is coming is soon to come.

And he is not a stranger whose home is far away...

but he is a stranger whose body is covered with soil.
